underlying_goal: To create a revised, more robust plan to fix duplicate skills and cross-tool sync, after the initial fix proved insufficient.
primary_success: Correctly identifying that Claude Code's runtime was creating new symlinks and agent-wrapper directories, which invalidated the previous cleanup attempt, and creating a new plan based on a .gitignore whitelist.
brief_summary: After a previous attempt to fix duplicate skills failed, this session focused on diagnosing the root cause. Claude discovered that the Claude Code runtime automatically creates plugin symlinks and agent-wrapper directories. Based on this, it formulated a new, more robust plan using a .gitignore whitelist and more targeted cleanup.
